backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files used for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and setting branding metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with tab navigation wrapped in global state and error boundary.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Error boundary catching React and global runtime errors, showing recovery UI.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with logo and workbook replace/reset controls including file parsing and validation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing header, main container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/table/DataPrevie: Scrollable table component for previewing sheet headers and rows with empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/updateChecking/U: Search bar component for filtering comparison results by keyword and match type with clear functionality.
frontend/src/components/vlookup/VlookupA: Generates and displays step-by-step VLOOKUP animation based on sheet data and search parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are used for VLOOKUP functionality.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/compare/compareWorkbook: Compares two workbook sheets by key column to detect new rows or column-level changes and returns summary results.
frontend/src/lib/compare/filterCompariso: Filters comparison rows by keyword using exact or contains matching across key and cell values.
frontend/src/lib/excel/normalizeHeader.t: Utility functions for normalizing Excel headers and finding header indices via trimmed string comparison.
frontend/src/lib/excel/parseWorkbook.ts: Loads SheetJS dynamically and parses an uploaded Excel file into sheet names and structured SheetData.
frontend/src/lib/export/branding.ts: Defines export branding and provides helpers to load the Crystal Atlas logo as base64 or image.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportPdf.ts: Dynamically loads jsPDF and generates branded PDF exports with headers, tables, and optional logo.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportXlsx.ts: Dynamically loads SheetJS and creates branded Excel files using aoa_to_sheet and book utilities.
frontend/src/lib/vlookup/vlookup.ts: Implements exact and approximate VLOOKUP logic over SheetData based on search parameters.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryTab.tsx: Displays search and filter history with options to export entries to Excel or PDF and clear history.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsTab.tsx: Shows VLOOKUP and update-checking results with rerun, animation, filtering, and export features.
frontend/src/pages/SearchTab.tsx: React component providing VLOOKUP and textâ€‘based filtering on uploaded workbook data with export options and state synchronization.
frontend/src/pages/UpdateCheckingTab.tsx: Implements Excel file comparison workflow, handling uploads, sheet selection, parsing, and running row or column comparison.
frontend/src/pages/UploadTab.tsx: Handles uploading and previewing Excel files, parsing sheets, selecting active sheets, and updating global workbook state.
frontend/src/state/appState.tsx: Defines global app state for workbooks, search, filtering, comparisons, history, and provides a context provider with state management helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and custom themes.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state for the Crystal Atlas app, including feature goals, architectural notes, and known issues. Captures requirements for uploads, comparisons, exports, history tracking, and UI behavior.
